description: This Java class 'AuditConfig' is a configuration class for setting up auditing and filtering in a Spring Boot application. It enables JPA auditing, provides a bean for auditing, and registers an authentication user filter for API endpoints.

classes.name: AuditConfig
classes.description: Configuration class that sets up JPA auditing and registers an authentication filter for API requests.

methods.name: myAuditorProvider
methods.description: Provides an AuditorAware bean for managing audit information, returning an instance of AuditorAwareConfig.

methods.name: authUserFilter
methods.description: Registers a FilterRegistrationBean for the AppAuthUserFilter, applying it to URL patterns starting with /api/.
